alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Hall; Lumpkin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lumpkin, southern Dawson and northwestern Hall Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 917 PM EDT, another strong thunderstorm was near Hollis Lathem Reservoir, or 7 miles southwest of Dawsonville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Dawsonville, Dougherty, Silver City, Murrayville, Hollis Lathem Reservoir, Auraria, Garland and McKee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for north central and northeastern Georgia.
